properties.areaDesc: Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 2:15PM MST until February 9 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Rapid City SD
properties.description:
...SNOW LATE SATURDAY INTO EARLY SUNDAY...

.The next system will move into the area Saturday afternoon,
bringing snowfall late Saturday and Saturday night. Snow will
taper off Sunday morning.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches.

* WHERE...The Northern Foot Hills and the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot
Hills.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Saturday to 9 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY
